name: color-contrast
author: alexbourt
title: Color Contrast
description: Measures contrast between two pixel colors

commands.name: contrast
commands.title: Contrast
commands.description: Analyzes the contrast between two pixel colors to help evaluate readability and accessibility.
commands.subtitle: Measure contrast between two pixel colors

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
